items.sentence: Tom claimed that he came from a rich family.
Tom considered the possibility of not going.
Mary hasn\'t shaved her legs in three years.
Tom probably didn\'t know about the meeting.
Tom probably doesn\'t even know who Mary is.
Tom and Mary\'s marriage lasted three years.
Are you sure I can\'t get you another drink?
Are you sure it\'s not the other way around?
I heard about what happened at school today.
I heard that Tom asked his boss for a raise.
She\'s not my grandmother. She\'s my mother.
I shouldn\'t have to put up with this noise.
I think we both know who\'s really to blame.
Tom promised to help Mary with her homework.
Tom promised to return the books I lent him.
Tom pulled open the door and stepped inside.
Tom pulled out his gun and aimed it at Mary.
Tom picked up a pillow and threw it at Mary.
Tom put down his spoon and picked up a fork.
Everybody is hoping nothing bad will happen.
